posts.title: Ramadan Giving 2025: A Record-Breaking Year of Community Impact
posts.excerpt: 1,965 lunch bags, 530 winter kits, and over $108K raised for Gaza relief. See how our community came together for our most impactful year yet.
posts.author: Ramadan Giving Team

posts.title: $197K+ Raised at Gala for Gaza Relief Efforts
posts.excerpt: Our community united to support families affected by the humanitarian crisis in Gaza through our annual gala event.
posts.author: Ramadan Giving Team

posts.title: Camp Day Joy: 174 Children Across Two Continents
posts.excerpt: 111 children in GTA and 63 in Cairo including Gazan evacuees enjoyed a day of fun, games, and celebration.
posts.author: Ramadan Giving Team

posts.title: 530 Winter Kits: Warming Hearts in the GTA
posts.excerpt: Our winter kit distribution program provided essential warmth supplies to families in need across the Greater Toronto Area.

posts.title: From Volunteer to Leader: My Journey with Ramadan Giving
posts.excerpt: Sarah Ahmed shares her inspiring story of how volunteering transformed her perspective and led her to become a community leader.

posts.title: Food Security Initiative: 460 Packages Delivered
posts.excerpt: Our ongoing food security program continues to make a difference, delivering nutritious food packages to families in need.

posts.title: Expanding Our Reach: New Community Partnerships
posts.excerpt: Announcing exciting new partnerships that will help us extend our impact to more communities in need.

posts.title: Cairo Operations: 370 Food Packs Distributed
posts.excerpt: Our Cairo team continues to serve vulnerable communities with essential food packages and support services.

posts.title: 430+ Hot Meals Served to Unhoused Communities
posts.excerpt: Our hot meals program continues to provide warmth and nourishment to those experiencing homelessness in the GTA.
